description:
Set up the global design system and layout:

**Palette:**
- Background: zinc-950 (#09090b)
- Primary text: zinc-100 (#f4f4f5)
- Secondary text: zinc-400 (#a1a1aa)
- Accent: subtle blueprint cyan (#06b6d4) for links only

**Typography:**
- Self-host Geist Sans and Geist Mono fonts
- Headings: Geist Sans (semi-bold)
- Dates & ledger entries: Geist Mono
- No shadows, no gradients
- Only subtle opacity transitions allowed (no animations)

**Container:**
- Max width 1100px on desktop
- Generous vertical spacing
- Clean hierarchy
- No decorative dividers

**Link styling rules:**
- Internal links use → arrow
- External links use ↗ arrow
- No emoji anywhere
- No icons except arrows

Build the complete homepage (/) with these exact sections in order:

**1. HERO SECTION:**
- Left side (desktop):

  - 'Building deployable autonomous hardware and AI systems from India.' as description

**4. ACTIVE BUILD FOCUS:**

- Signals forward motion

**5. BACKED BY:**

- Display 6 placeholder logo slots (grayscale boxes)
- Logos should have subtle hover brighten effect
- Each logo placeholder should be clickable with ↗ arrow behavior

**6. IMPACT SNAPSHOT:**
- Section title: 'Recent Impact'
- Display 6 placeholder impact entries in ledger format using Geist Mono:
  - '2026 — ₹1,00,000 Grant — Malpani Ventures'
  - '2026 — Panel Invite — XYZ Conference'
  - '2025 — Prize Winner — KBC'
  - '2025 — Media Feature — Runtime Magazine'
  - (add 2 more examples)
- Each row clickable linking to /impact
- Link below list: '→ View Full Impact'

**7. COLLABORATE SECTION:**
- Title: 'Collaborate / Enable'
- Text: 'We are actively seeking:'
- Bullet list (no emoji):
  - Hardware sponsorship
  - Cloud infrastructure credits
  - Manufacturing access
  - Research collaboration
  - Institutional grants
  - Media features
- Button/link: '→ Collaborate' linking to /collaborate

**8. FOOTER:**
- 'Lakshveer Rao'
- 'Co-Founder — Projects by Laksh'
- 'Based in Hyderabad, India (UTC+5:30)'
- Divider
- 'Primary Contact:'
- 'Capt. Venkat'
- 'First Backer, Investor & Operations Lead'
- 'Primary Point of Contact'
- Email link (placeholder: contact@projectsbylaksh.com)
- 'LinkedIn ↗' (placeholder link)

Mobile-first responsive layout. Industrial minimalism only.

Build the /systems page with the following structure:

**Header:**
- Title: 'Systems'
- Intro paragraph: 'Engineering-first systems across robotics, edge AI, autonomous agents, and hardware execution platforms.'

**Categories with systems (create placeholder entries for each):**

**1. Flagship Platforms (3 entries):**
- Hardvare - Hardware execution platform for deployable systems
- GrantBot - Autonomous grant discovery and application agent
- Motion-Control Gaming - Gesture-based gaming interface

**2. Robotics (4 entries):**
- LineBot v3 - Advanced line-following robot with PID control
- ObstacleBot Pro - Multi-sensor obstacle avoidance system
- ArmBot Mini - 3-DOF robotic arm with precision control
- SwarmBot Alpha - Coordinated multi-robot swarm prototype

**3. Vision & Edge AI (4 entries):**
- FaceDetect Edge - Real-time face detection on Raspberry Pi
- ObjectTracker v2 - Computer vision object tracking system
- GestureAI - Hand gesture recognition for HCI
- EdgeClassifier - On-device image classification

**4. Experimental Devices (3 entries):**
- SensorHub - Multi-sensor data aggregation platform
- IoT Gateway - Edge computing gateway for sensor networks
- PowerMonitor - Real-time power consumption tracker

**Each system entry displays:**
- Title (bold)
- One-line descriptor (secondary text)
- 'GitHub ↗' link (placeholder #)
- 'Demo ↗' link (placeholder #)

No awards shown here - this is a pure engineering index.
Use same design system (zinc-950 background, minimal styling, no decorations).
Group systems by category with clear section headings.

Build the /collaborate page with a working contact form:

**Header:**
- Title: 'Collaborate'
- Intro: 'We are building deployable hardware and AI systems and are open to serious collaboration.'

**Two-column layout (desktop):**

**Left column - What We Need:**
- Heading: 'What We Need'
- Bullet list (plain bullets, no emoji):
  - Hardware credits
  - Manufacturing support
  - Testing environments
  - Cloud infrastructure
  - Research mentorship
  - Grant introductions

**Right column - What We Offer:**
- Heading: 'What We Offer'
- Bullet list (plain bullets, no emoji):
  - Live demonstrations
  - Workshops
  - Co-created pilots
  - Product testing feedback
  - Youth innovation representation

**Form section below:**
- Heading: 'Get in Touch'

**Form fields:**
- Name (text input, required)
- Email (email input, required)
- Organisation (text input, required)
- Category (dropdown select with options):
  - Hardware Sponsorship
  - Cloud Credits
  - Manufacturing Access
  - Research Collaboration
  - Institutional Grant
  - Media Feature
  - Other
- Message (textarea, required)

**Submit button:**
- Text: 'Send Inquiry →'
- On submit: For now, show a success message 'Thank you for your inquiry. We will respond within 48 hours.'
- The form should be set up to later integrate with Supabase and Resend (add comments in code noting this)

**Form styling:**
- Dark input fields matching zinc-950 theme
- Border: subtle zinc-800
- Focus state: cyan accent border
- No shadows or decorations
- Clean, professional appearance

Same minimal design system throughout.

Build the /admin page with a protected admin dashboard:

**Authentication:**
- The page should be protected (show login form if not authenticated)
- Login form with email and password fields
- Add comments for future Supabase Auth integration
- For now, use a simple demo mode toggle to simulate logged-in state

**Dashboard Layout when logged in:**

**Tab navigation:**
- Manage Systems
- Manage Impact
- Manage Supporters
- Collaboration Inquiries

**Manage Systems tab:**
- Table/list showing: Title, Category, Featured (yes/no), Actions
- Add New System button
- Edit and Delete actions for each row
- Form for adding/editing: Title, Description, Category (dropdown: Flagship Platforms, Robotics, Vision & Edge AI, Experimental Devices), Link, Is Featured checkbox

**Manage Impact tab:**
- Table/list showing: Title, Type, Organisation, Featured (yes/no), Actions
- Add New Impact button
- Edit and Delete actions for each row
- Form for adding/editing: Title, Type (dropdown: Grant, Award, Panel, Workshop, Product, Media), Organisation, Description, Link, Is Featured checkbox

**Manage Supporters tab:**
- Table/list showing: Name, Logo URL, Featured (yes/no), Actions
- Add New Supporter button
- Edit and Delete actions for each row
- Form for adding/editing: Name, Logo URL, Link, Is Featured checkbox

**Collaboration Inquiries tab:**
- Read-only table showing: Name, Email, Organisation, Category, Date, Actions
- View full message action (expand/modal)
- Mark as read/handled status toggle
- Delete action

**Design:**
- Same zinc-950 dark theme
- Clean table layouts with subtle borders
- Forms in modals or inline expand sections
- All actions with clear button styling
- No fancy UI libraries - keep it minimal
- Add comments for future Supabase CRUD integration
